metadata.name: Mail4U
metadata.description:
Let's have some fun by taking high school drama vibes and bringing them straight to web3.

Send a love letter to your crush, deliver a not-so-friendly message to someone you dislike, or let those repressed lust feeling out through the blockchain!

Burning for:  
Love Mail: 1x Envelope  
Hate Mail: 2x Envelope  
Fuck Mail: 3x Envelope

Good luck!

Tip: Use a burner if you want to send these mails to someone.
